verses.verse: These also are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>; Nadab <S%H5070><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%> which were anointed <S%H4886><s%>, whom he consecrated <S%H4390><s%> to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.

And Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, when they offered <S%H7126><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and they had no sons <S%H1121><s%>: and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%> ministered in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Bring <S%H7126><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> near <S%H7126><s%>, and present <S%H5975><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, that they may minister unto him <S%H8334><s%>.

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> his charge <S%H4931><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And you shall give <S%H5414><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>: they are wholly given <S%H5414><s%> unto him out of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And you shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and they shall wait on <S%H8104><s%> their priest <S%H3550><s%>'s office: and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that comes near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

And I <S%H3947><s%>, behold, I have taken the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: therefore the Levites shall be mine <S%H3881><s%>;

Because all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> are mine <S%H3117><s%>; for on the day that I struck <S%H5221><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I hallowed <S%H6942><s%> unto me all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, both man <S%H120><s%> and animal <S%H929><s%>: mine shall they be <S%H3068><s%>: I am the Lord.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Number <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>: every male <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> shall you number them <S%H6485><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> them according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, as he was commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
And these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> by their names <S%H8034><s%>; Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, and Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, and Merari <S%H4847><s%>.
And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>; Libni <S%H3845><s%>, and Shimei <S%H8096><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>; Amram <S%H6019><s%>, and Izehar <S%H3324><s%>, Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>; Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, and Mushi <S%H4187><s%>. These are <S%H1992><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> was the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Libnites <S%H3846><s%>, and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shimites <S%H8097><s%>: these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%>.

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4557><s%>, according to the number of all the males <S%H2145><s%>, from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.
The families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> shall pitch <S%H2583><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>.
And the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the father <S%H1><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> shall be Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Lael <S%H3815><s%>.

And the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> shall be the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the tent <S%H168><s%>, the covering <S%H4372><s%> there <S%H4539><s%>, and the hanging for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>,

And the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, and the curtain <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, which is by the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and by the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the cords <S%H4340><s%> of it for all the service there <S%H5656><s%>.

And of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> was the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Amramites <S%H6020><s%>, and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Izeharites <S%H3325><s%>, and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hebronites <S%H2276><s%>, and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Uzzielites <S%H5817><s%>: these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>.

In the number <S%H4557><s%> of all the males <S%H2145><s%>, from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, were eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, keeping <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.
The families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall pitch <S%H2583><s%> on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%>.

And the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the father <S%H1><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> shall be Elizaphan <S%H469><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>.

And their charge <S%H4931><s%> shall be the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the table <S%H7979><s%>, and the lampstand <S%H4501><s%>, and the altars <S%H4196><s%>, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> with which they minister <S%H8334><s%>, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%>, and all the service there <S%H5656><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be chief <S%H5387><s%> over the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and have the oversight <S%H6486><s%> of them that keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

Of Merari <S%H4847><s%> was the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mahlites <S%H4250><s%>, and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mushites <S%H4188><s%>: these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>.

And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4557><s%>, according to the number of all the males <S%H2145><s%>, from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, were six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the father <S%H1><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> was Zuriel <S%H6700><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abihail <S%H32><s%>: these shall pitch <S%H2583><s%> on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>.

And under the custody <S%H6486><s%> and charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> shall be the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the bars <S%H1280><s%> there <S%H5982><s%>, and the pillars there <S%H134><s%>, and the sockets there <S%H3627><s%>, and all the vessels there <S%H5656><s%>, and all the service there,
And the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%>, and their pins <S%H3489><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>.

But those that encamp <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> toward the east <S%H6924><s%>, even before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>, shall be Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, keeping <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> for the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that comes near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, throughout their families <S%H4940><s%>, all the males <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Number <S%H6485><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the males <S%H2145><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, and take <S%H5375><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of their names <S%H8034><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> for me <S%H3068><s%> (I am the Lord <S%H1060><s%>) instead of all the firstborn among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the cattle <S%H929><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> among the cattle <S%H929><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H1060><s%>, all the firstborn among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> males <S%H2145><s%> by the number <S%H4557><s%> of names <S%H8034><s%>, from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, of those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H6242><s%>, were twenty and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and sixty and thirteen <S%H7657><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of their cattle <S%H929><s%>; and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be my <S%H3068><s%>: I am the Lord.

And for those that are to be redeemed <S%H6302><s%> of the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and sixty and thirteen <S%H7657><s%> of the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which are more <S%H5736><s%> than <S%H5921><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>;

You shall even take <S%H3947><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> apiece by the poll <S%H1538><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> them <S%H8255><s%>: (the shekel is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>:)
And you shall give <S%H5414><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%>, with which the odd number <S%H5736><s%> of them is to be redeemed <S%H6302><s%>, unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the redemption <S%H6306><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> of them that were over <S%H5736><s%> and above them that were redeemed <S%H6302><s%> by the Levites <S%H3881><s%>:

Of the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> he the money <S%H3701><s%>; a thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and sixty <S%H8346><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>:

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> of them that were redeemed <S%H6302><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
